title: The Law of a Jerk
summary:
"How can my past self get so excited doing all those embarrassing things!?"

When he was in the third year of middle school, Hizaki Shiou was summoned to another world to save it. After defeating the Demon King, he was forcibly returned back to the present day. Yet another three years later, he is summoned to the other world once again, this time to stop the rampage of the secret society "Helheim."

That organization was supposedly actually the one that he had founded during his *chuunibyou* phase, where he called himself the "Corpse King"—a dark past too embarrassing to remember!

Someone seems to be impersonating the name of "Helheim" and tarnishing its reputation. To uncover the truth behind this mystery and clear the organization's name, the Corpse King reunites with his former subordinates, the "Hakkai," who once made Helheim the strongest it had ever been. While agonizing over his dark past, he begins to take action in the other world once again.

Their first stop is the Steel City of Gagiul—rescue the city struggling through famine as well as the pale-looking count's daughter in distress.

"Helheim, moving out."

title: A Romantic Ending with My 2D Boyfriend!
summary: From flirts to mama’s boys to married men, intentionally Sun Choi keeps dating men like those. Promising to herself, not to date men like those ever again, she developed a game called ‘Dating Simulation.’ Since its release is just around the corner that she went to work even on the weekend and played the game as a developer. She plays a ‘share house version’ where you can meet various men of various classes all at once. However, she gets wakes up in the game as the female character.

title: Girl with a Knife
summary: Kaoru Terasaki is a gamer who’s into MMORPGs, and he’s finally meeting up with someone he’s been friends with in-game for a long while—this time, offline and in person. He’s worried that his friend will be disappointed to see Kaoru is a guy, unlike his female character in the game. But he’s the one who’s in for a surprise when, instead of another guy, his friend turns out to be a cute girl, Nanami Osaka. On top of that, Nanami told her parents that she would be bringing a friend over—a female friend. Even worse, Nanami’s dad is the super overprotective type who won’t allow any guys near his daughter. There’s only one solution to this dilemma: Kaoru has to cross-dress as a girl! Will Kaoru’s efforts pay off in the end?! Will Kaoru and Nanami remain just friends, or will their time together IRL change everything? Follow their romantic-comedy adventures to find out!

title: Ready Shoot, For love
summary:
"Do you agree with this love, or are you very much against it?" 

What would you do if you finally found the love of your dreams but it is someone you shouldn't have fallen in love with? 

Ichibana is a girl who is a little bit girly and a little bit hot-tempered. She falls in love with Maki, a plain boy in her class, but just as she is about to confess her feelings to him, she finds out, to her surprise that he has a girlfriend!

title: The Magic Tower’s Problem Child
summary: Once the greatest mage and Grand Magus of the White Tower, Oscar Sage dies in a war against The Demon Emperor—only to awaken twenty years later as the disgraced noble, Oscar Crusian. The once-mighty White Tower lies in ruins, and rival factions hold control over military and resources. With his mana circuits sealed and former allies now enemies, Oscar must rebuild the White Tower, seek vengeance, and reclaim his power before the Mage Council exiles him for good. Will magic rise again or will it be buried forever?

title: Ghost Story Club (Remake)
summary:
Lee Joon was an ordinary high school student.

During the entrance ceremony, he was caught up in a strange phenomenon and died.

[You have died.] [Restarting from checkpoint.] [Loading…]

But then, a message appeared before his eyes.

『Congratulations on your acceptance at Nakseong Highschool, the school of secrets and mysteries. Uncover the shady secrets hidden within the school, or fight against the legends and ghost stories of the campus in order to earn points to unlock special abilities. Additionally, you must gather comrades to prevent the resurrection of the Demon King before graduation. The world is in your hands.』

title: I will break ties with the harmful sister
summary:
Clara, who had been oppressed for many years by her tyrant sister, Enefia. Even their parents obeyed the sister's wishes, and Clara had no place in the Astraia Baron’s household despite it being her home. In the midst of this, Clara's sister's engagement to a prominent nobleman was decided, and Clara finally felt relieved, believing she would be freed from this hell. However, even after the engagement, the sister's unfaithful nature did not change, and fearing the fiancé might discover the inconvenient truth, the parents ordered Clara to monitor her sister. Despite Clara's efforts, her sister became pregnant with another man's child. The engagement was broken off, and the sister quickly eloped somewhere, leaving the Astraia Baron’s household with a huge debt, angering the influential nobleman. In order to repay her family's debts, Clara was sold to a sadistic noble and faced severe torture, ultimately approaching death.

"If I could do it over again... This time, I will definitely kill you!" When Clara opened her eyes again, time had rewound to the day of her sister’s engagement. Revived with strong determination, Clara pushed back against her sister's insidious bullying and ran to change the worst possible future.

title: Anyone Can See It’s A Beast
summary:
Q: Can a wolf and a lion get married and have a rabbit as a kid?
A: Stop talking nonsense, wash your feet, and go to sleep.

...And just like that, I ended up in a situation where I really should just wash my feet and sleep. My dad's a lion, my mom's a wolf, and somehow, I'm a rabbit. Not just any rabbit, an extra who becomes the trigger for a war in the novel! At this rate, not only will everyone die, but both my mom's and dad's entire families will be wiped out.

'No way. I have to change my fate somehow.'

I clenched my fists and stood up determinedly, but then...

"Chloe, do you know what's for dinner tonight? That's right... rabbit meat!"

First things first, I need to make sure the wolves at home don't find out what I really am.

I thought all I had to do was hide the fact that I'm a rabbit. But a bigger problem showed up. Of all the countless special abilities among beastmen, I just had to get "being pitied." I thought this life was doomed too, but then...

"We’re not fighting. So... don't cry, okay? Please."

My parents, who even stopped a war because they were worried about me.

"Just say the word. If you want, I can kill everyone who's bullying you."

And even the original novel's male lead, who's gone a little overboard taking my side.

Honestly... stopping a war might be easier than I thought. Maybe this ability... is more useful than I realized?

title: Healing Life Through Camping In Another World
summary: Star chef Ganghyeon Lee, who has lost his sense of taste, retreats to a peaceful countryside to escape the public eye. In his grandfather's rural home, he stumbles upon a portal to another world. Taking advantage of his escape, he decides to enjoy a relaxed camping life in this new world. However, the inhabitants of this world keep showing interest in him. Will Ganghyeon be able to live a peaceful life?

title: Primordial Ten Fiends: Others Tame Beasts, I Tame Beast Girls
summary: After three years of lying low, Lin Han awakened the Beast Taming System and gained ten ultra-fierce beast girls! Tearing apart enemies by day and taming beast girls by night, he was directly drained by them into becoming the pinnacle of global combat power!

title: Genius Prismatic Mage
summary: In a world where you must steal or be stolen, kill or be killed, Ray, an orphan from the 50th sector, possesses the unique ability to see mana in the form of colors. However, despite the colorful sparks that fill the world around him, his existence has been numb detachment, completely devoid of emotions. But when a life-altering event shatters the cold, unfeeling life he once knew, Ray's journey might just unfold into a story richer in color than he could have ever imagined.

title: The Almighty Daughter Runs The World
summary:
After traveling through time and space, Ye Zhuo became a fake daughter of a wealthy family and a notorious bastard that everyone disdained. But so what? Although Ye Zhuo was dealt a bad hand, she would still win.

Ye Zhuo quickly made room for the real daughter of the wealthy family and then helped her mother and uncle get rich overnight.

As an unparalleled talented woman, she became the head of a technology firm and had a fortune of hundreds of billions of dollars, directly reaching the pinnacle of her life! Meanwhile, she was having a relationship with a wealthy tycoon who always doted on her!

title: I Can See Your Stats!
summary: Arase Itou has the ability to see a few minutes into the future, but the glimpses he sees are always linked to misfortune. With his kind-hearted nature, Arata decides to use this inconvenient power to help girls facing various troubles and prevent their unfortunate futures. However, Arase doesn't realize that, little by little, the girls are growing fond of him. And he remains oblivious to the quiet rivalries forming between them over his attention.

title: The Player Hides His Past
summary:
The real world is suddenly ambushed by rifts that threaten to spill out monsters from the VR game Chronicles of Arcana. These rifts can only be closed by Players, people who have awakened as their in-game characters with all the same stats and skills. 

Unfortunately for protagonist Lee Hoyeol, his awakening is the opposite of cool as his avatar happens to be the one he made during the height of his awkward phase in middle school, giving him all the mannerisms and speech of an absolute cringelord. 

Just how will he go on to become the hero humanity needs most?

title: I randomly have a new career every week
summary: After being fired from his company, Lin Yi accidentally gets the All-Pro Experience System. Lin Yi relies on the various career arrangements and generous rewards given by the system to achieve his ambition and path to wealth step by step, becoming the ultimate all-powerful big brother who dominates the world.

title: The Duty of an Academy Student Should Be to Study
Possible to Date a Ranker?
summary:
Collections, in no particular order, of super short comics posted by author Hamita on Twitter/X and pixiv. The short story collections mainly include romcom and boy meets girl, but also include various genres such as scifi, gag, and suspense.

## Volume 1
1. An Imperfect Woman
2. Different Kind Of Different Kind
3. My Girlfriend Isn't Cute
4. Image Frequency
5. A Salesman Who Sells Greed
6. Maid Makeshift
7. A Goddess Without Inconvenience
8. One-Night-Only Passingman
9. Overhumankind's Planet

## Volume 2
10. Persistent Sports Girl
11. Misdelivered Love Letter
12. The Person Who Filled My Heart
13. A Beauty Soft And Fluffy In All Directions
14. The Apathetic Maid's Mismanagement
15. A Cold Senior And Warm Junior
16. The Ideal Cool Girl Who Is Only Kind To Herself
17. Duplicity And A Laughingstock
18. Robot And Landscape Painting

## Volume 3
19. The Soft-Spoken Conveni Clerk
20. A Girl Who Grasped A Secret
21. A Girlfriend Who Wants To Make Meals
22. I Want To Quit Being A Demon
23. A Bad Girl's Bag Inspection
24. Otherworldly Civilization
25. I Like Beauties Even With Bad Personalities
26. Counselor
27. The Transfer Student Ranked First In The Year
28. A Literature Girl Who's Kind To Geeks But Strict Only With Me

title: It’s Okay to Be Left Out
summary: Our company is pleasing to the eye! From the gentle team leader to the handsome CEO! However, I made a ridiculous mistake at the new employee welcome party. The wonderful team leader until yesterday is starting to turn away from me... I can't put an end to my love for the team leader like this! I was going straight and going straight until you accepted my virtue... But can someone tell me why this becomes a love affair and not a virtue?

title: I’m Imprisoned By The Mad Dog I Raised
summary:
Elizabeth found herself reincarnated as the deceased first love of Ernst, the male protagonist of a 19+ dark novel. And to make matters worse, she ends up with the fate of an extra who doesn't even appear in the original story, dying at the hands of the traitor Karsis on her wedding day.

She tried to stop the rebellion to survive, but the scale of the mess the original owner of her body had caused was just too big. Not only had she had an inappropriate relationship with her loyal servant Karsis, but she had also wronged him terribly. Feeling guilty, she tried to set him free, but...

"That won't do. Betrayal, that is. If you throw away a dog that was already abandoned once, this time it might bite its master."

With half-crazed eyes, he was trying to kill me...? Wait, hold on. Ka-Karsis!

title: Book of the Dead
summary: Percival, a kind boy, lives with his grandfather in a remote place called "God's Finger". However, the world will not allow him to live in peace. An encounter with a mysterious knight changes their fate, and a shocking secret is revealed. The boy sets out on an endless journey.

title: Love Letter
summary: Fumi Isshiki works as an accountant at an entertainment agency. One day he is transferred to the management department, where Ayano Haga, a 13-year-old child actress, seems to take a liking to him... She is just a child, yet she acts more mature than many adults.

title: The Way That Knight Lives As a Lady
summary:
The sword of my closest friend and trusted adjutant pierced my body. When I opened my eyes again, I had become a noble lady of the enemy kingdom. In an unfamiliar and weak stranger’s body, three year’s time was lost, in which my homeland was brought to ruin. I was unable to come to my senses because of the pain of betrayal and confusion of my identity. However, eventually I decided to live on as 'Luciphella Aidine', a noble who wields a sword.  


---

title: Grand Duke of the North
summary:
I became the sister of the villain, who shed no blood or tears in a war-ridden novel! I thought I was born again as the youngest daughter of a noble family, but I'm the little sister of a villain who's only being used!  
  
A baby's body too fragile to survive in the Lagrange household, a brutal family that makes children fight for successors… I've decided to stick to the villain in order to live!  
  
I need you to be my guardian until I run away from here. Raise me, villain!  


---

title: I Regressed, but the World didn’t End
summary:
Humanity’s last hope just got a second chance… and a mountain of debt. 

Dohyeok, the champion of humankind, is sent back in time to stop the apocalypse. He then pours his time, money, and soul into preparing for an alien invasion that never comes. 

Now chased by creditors instead of aliens, Dohyeok turns to game streaming to repay his debt. 

Follow the ex-hero-turned-streamer as he hacks his way through popular game titles one epic stream at a time!

title: Evolution Begins With A Big Tree
summary:
Reborn as a willow tree!? Resurrection of spiritual energy, rise of all things. The reborn willow has also embarked on the path of evolution. It can evolve infinitely, is it “divine power” or “curse”?

Official Translations:
[Japanese](https://piccoma.com/web/product/146958)

title: Newcomers Turn Low at Night
summary: No summary available.

title: Aristocrat’s Revenge
summary: No summary available.

title: Maru is a Puppy
summary:
The hero's son and the ghost of the Demon King are the master and disciple!?

Earth, the son of Hero, the hero who defeated the Great Demon King, is troubled.
Always expected to achieve great things, but unable to meet those expectations.
No matter the effort he puts in, and the results he obtains, it's never enough.
“You're a disappointment compared to your father.”
“Don't you know you're the son of the hero!!”
Living every day like this, Earth meets his destiny in the room containing his father's sword.

“Interesting. I will train you. I have only free time now.”

Earth receives special personal training from the Demon King just to get back at his parents and the world.
In the coming days, his parents, the heroes of the past, his first love, his princess childhood friend, the geniuses of the era, and the world will tremble before him.

**Note:** While initially released with the “What's Wrong With The Hero's Son Being The Demon King's Disciple?” subtitle, in line with the web and light novels, the manga switched to the new “Boy Meets Satan” subtitle by the release of the 1st volume.
___
**Character Designer:** [Ryuutetsu](https://mangadex.org/author/796d659c-1d83-4956-a7bb-d0bcf8424284)

**Additional Links:**
- Official Raw Web Novel: [Kakuyomu](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/1177354054918478427), [Shousetsuka ni Narou](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9185fm)

title: Disaster Is Always Nearby
summary: Everything seems perfect in Dami Yun's life. Her career prospects look bright, and her childhood crush Ho-won even moved back to Korea to confess to her. But her world turns upside down when an anonymous letter leads her to a mysterious house, where she ends up trapped for three hours… except in the outside world, a decade has passed and Dami has been declared dead! Can Jaenan, the mysterious, surly god and owner of the home, help her navigate this chaos? Why does disaster strike wherever she goes? And why is this unhelpful god having prophetic dreams about them being together?!

title: Logging 10,000 Years into the Future
summary: At the beginning of the martial dao, abnormal beasts invaded the world. Humanity’s martials had to retreat in defeat time and time again. Lu Sheng transmigrates to that time, but in his dreams he enters a world 10 000 years later. The foundational body refining method from 10k years in the future is several thousand times more effective than the current one. Then there’s the breathing method, body refining pill formula, and sacred martial law from 10k years later… Despite developing martial arts for 10k years, humanity was annihilated! Their martial arts civilization reached the apex, and yet there was no one left to inherit it. Except Lu Sheng, he’s exactly that last spark of hope!

title: Worthless Profession: Dragon Tamer
summary: Combining reality with a gaming world where ferocious beasts roam freely, filled with numerous mysteries and dungeons. In order to defend against the onslaught of these beasts, everyone undergoes class transfers and crazily levels up. On the day of his transfer, Lu Fan becomes a hidden class – Dragon Tamer. However, due to the immense strength of dragons, it is deemed impossible for anyone to tame them, earning Dragon Tamer the reputation of being the most useless class. Fortunately, he awakens the Super Treasure Map System. As Lu Fan, with his mighty dragon, sweeps through everything, the entire world trembles.

title: My Beloved Oppressor
summary: Annette Rosenberg, a descendant of the Padanian royal family and the only daughter of a military captain. After two years of dating, she married her father’s faithful servant, Heiner Valdemar. Everything was perfect. Until her family fell due to her husband’s betrayal. “You will be unhappy by my side for the rest of your life.” Annette suddenly realized something. This man’s revenge is just beginning.

title: Heavenly Grand Archive’s Young Master
summary:
The soul of the charming and imposing Martial Arts Alliance Leader, Hu-Gong, suddenly wakes up in the body of a young man.

That young man’s name is Beom-Hang. He’s the young master of the ‘Heavenly Grand Archive’, one of the three major archives of the Jianghu, yet he is a sorry excuse of a person.

To determine why his soul has swapped bodies, Hu-Gong begins to train Beom-Hang’s body. When the possessed young master of the Heavenly Grand Archive’s movements are totally different from how they used to be, it starts to attract the attention of the Jianghu...

title: Trait Hoarder
summary:
Junsu is an ordinary college student who spends an extraordinary amount of time trying to beat a pay-to-win hero collector game called Arcane Seoul. 

All his hours of painstaking gameplay finally pays off when he lands Cheonma, one of the ultimate SS-ranked characters in the game, seconds before a truck runs him over. Now, he finds himself as Jeonsa Kim, a basic tutorial-stage character who can learn any skill. 

Can he use his gaming knowledge to survive the godforsaken, magic-driven, and monster-ridden alternate world of Arcane Seoul?

title: I Became the Emperor’s Cat
summary:
After my sudden death, I was reincarnated in a strange world with a sultan and his harem, but not as a person, but as a kitten who can't talk!

I can only become human by kissing a prince who is worthy of the sultan...

After mistaking me for an assassin and treating me coldly, Prince Soliman says, "......It's soft, it's warm, can we stay here for a while?" as he approached me.

Prince Theron, who I thought was a sweetheart, seduces me by whispering, "Choose me over my brother, and I will give you everything you want." "I will give you everything you want," he whispered, seducing me.

I can't stay human unless I kiss one of them. "Nyaaong!" (Headache!)
How do I survive in this royal palace?

title: Magic Emperor
summary:
Because he had the heritage of the ancient Demonic Emperor, Demonic Emperor Zhuo Yifan met the misfortune of being betrayed and killed by his trusted disciple. After being reborn, his cultivation went back to zero and he was trapped by a heart demon, given no choice but to become the housekeeper of the Luo Family's lone eldest miss. From being a Magic Emperor to being an insignificant housekeeper, how would he get along with his "heart demon eldest miss" and what power would he gain in order to lead himself and the declining family to rise back to the peak of the continent!


---

**Note:** 魔 can mean "magic" and "demon", while 管家 can mean "butler" and "housekeeper". I'm not sure as to why the previous translator decided to use "Magic" when it's a cultivation world, but I'll just follow. And Zhou Fan never does the work of a housekeeper throughout the manhua.

---

[Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-servant-is-the-demon-king/info)

title: Serpent Ancestor
summary:
In a village, an old snake inadvertently swallowed a cultivator's human-shaped pill, gaining intelligence and setting off on the path of cultivation. With only a brief decade to live, the snake does not fear the passing of time but makes the most of every moment.

This is the tale of an old snake's journey to immortality.

title: Even Though I Transmigrated as a Villainess, I’d Rather Raise a Cat
summary:
I transmigrated as Rowaine, the villainess who was executed for abusing a werebeast. In order to escape death, I decided to replace my sister Linier in her arranged marriage.

The problem is that Duke Blois, the groom, is a cat werebeast who is known as a bloodthirsty battlefield monster…

“My dear, I heard your hobbies include abusing werebeasts like myself.”

“I haven’t heard of such a condition stating that women who abused werebeasts could not be Your Grace’s wife, though.”

His emerald eyes flashed dangerously at me, I quickly kept speaking before he could say anything.

“If my hobby is a problem, then I promise that I will never abuse you, Your Grace.”

“Ha– what?”

This is the story of a ten-year contractual marriage between a cat lover and a prickly cat werebeast.

title: Marriage Escape
summary:
Burned out from work, Yeonseul’s long-awaited vacation takes a disastrous turn when she finds herself stranded on an island. Her only company? A maddeningly handsome stranger, infuriating as he is irresistible–but with survival forcing them together, sparks fly and an impulsive marriage marked by a night neither can forget transforms their relationship into something rather intimate. But as rescue brings an end to their rendezvous, Yeonseul reluctantly resigns herself to the end of her castaway romance–except her island husband doesn’t want to, their love story far from over.

----
*Note: The English adaptation is R15. The original work is R19.*

title: The Loner Girl Who Holds the Heirs’ Fate
summary:
Nanako Fujiwara, a socially isolated high school girl, remains an outcast even after transferring schools—until one day, her life takes a dramatic turn!

She’s unexpectedly tasked with a crucial mission: selecting the next heir of a powerful conglomerate (zaibatsu). To "accurately evaluate the candidates’ leadership qualities," she must live with four dazzlingly handsome brothers competing for the title:

Yamato Mitsurugi (Eldest):

Flawless Student Council President

Vibe: "Excellence isn’t my goal—it’s my default."

Shizumaru Tenhou (Second):

Undefeated Street Fighter

Vibe: "Try saying no. I’ll make you regret it."

Hikaru Sennen-zaka (Third):

Illegally Adorable Mascot

Vibe: "Nee-chan, let’s bake cookies!" (…Why is his stock portfolio outperforming Wall Street?)

Ukyou Sumeragi (Youngest):

Mysterious Beauty Incarnate

Vibe: "You keep staring… Do I haunt your dreams?"

The Catch: Each brother deploys every tactic imaginable—from sweet persuasion to corporate sabotage—to win Nanako’s favor.

title: A Corporate Underling Who Excels at Work
summary:
Chae Gyeong-jun, who gave up both college and his dreams due to the IMF crisis,
once again faces despair in front of his grandmother's sudden hospitalization fees.
But then, a "Mysterious Benefactor" steps in to cover the hospital costs for his family...
"Who would provide support that doesn't help them at all, and why?"
In search of an answer, Gyeong-jun heads to Taeseong.
